alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Coffee, northwestern Bacon, southern Jeff Davis and northwestern Appling Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Snipesville, or 11 miles northeast of Broxton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baxley, Graham, Plant Hatch, Snipesville, Denton and Pine Grove. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
